blocks.name: isacs
blocks.content: A set is an algebraic closure system iff it is specified by some function of the finite subsets, such that a set is closed iff it does not expand under the operation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isacs(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cacs, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cmre, c1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cfv(cmre, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cacs, c1), crab(hs0, cfv(cmre, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs1, c1, universe, cacs, crab(hs0, cfv(cmre, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))), crab(hs0, cfv(cmre, cv(hs1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cmre, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmre, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cmre)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wf(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))), wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))
  feq23d(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  raleqdv(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))

  fvex(cmre, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cfv(cmre, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))
  ralbidv(s1, cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))
  bibi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cfv(cmre, c1), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1))))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmre, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmre, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cv(s1)), cfn))), cv(s1)))))))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)

blocks.name: acsmre
blocks.content: Algebraic closure systems are closure systems. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: isacs2
blocks.content: In the definition of an algebraic closure system, we may always take the operation being closed over as the Moore closure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isacs2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn))), cv(hs1))))))))
  isacs(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn))), cv(hs1)))))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn))), cv(hs1)))))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wral(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), wss(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs1))))))))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cuni(cima(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn))), cv(hs1))))), wa(wf(cv(hs0), cpw(c1), cpw(c1)), wral(hs1, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wral(hs2, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), wss(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs1)))))))

blocks.name: acsfiel
blocks.content: A set is closed in an algebraic closure system iff it contains all closures of finite subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsfiel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c0), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmrc, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)))
  acsmre(c0, c1)

  rspcdva(hs0, c2, cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c0), wral(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, c0), wral(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2)))

  ineq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn, cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c2)
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wss(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))

  elfvdm(c0, cacs, c1)

blocks.name: mreacs
blocks.content: Algebraicity is a composable property; combining several algebraic closure properties gives another. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: acsfn
blocks.content: Algebraicity of a conditional point closure condition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wss(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), cfv(cacs, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wss(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), cfv(cacs, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wss(cuni(cima(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn))), cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))))
  rabbidva(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))), wi(wss(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), wss(cuni(cima(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn))), cv(s0)))
  3bitrrd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0))), wi(wss(c3, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), wss(cuni(cima(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn))), cv(s0)), wss(ciun(hs1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs1), c3))), cv(s0)), wral(hs1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))))
  sseq1d(cuni(cima(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn))), cv(s0), ciun(hs1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0))))
  eqtr3d(cuni(cima(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn))), ciun(hs1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs1), c3))), ciun(hs1, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c0), cif(csn(c2), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfn))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0))))

blocks.name: acsfn0
blocks.content: Algebraicity of a point closure condition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsfn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cacs, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cacs, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wss(emptycls, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  rabbii(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wi(wss(emptycls, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))
  a1bi(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(emptycls, cv(s0)))
  0ss(cv(s0))
  mpanr12(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wss(emptycls, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), cfv(cacs, c0)), wss(emptycls, c0), wcel(emptycls, cfn))
  0ss(c0)
  0fin()
  acsfn(s0, c0, c1, c2, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
